title.narrative: Accelerating Private and Public Investment in Infrastructure Component: Capital Expenditure

description.narrative: This activity (Accelerating Private and Public Investment in Infrastructure Component: Capital Expenditure) is a component of Accelerating Investment and Infrastructure in Nepal reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £8,808,859. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Energy generation, renewable sources - multiple technologies, Industrial development. , with the following implementing partners: IMC Worldwide. The start date is 13-05-2016 and the end date is 31-03-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Energy generation, renewable sources - multiple technologies

description.narrative: Industry - Economic Affairs - Industry - development and services
